attacked: You dare challenge the chosen of Zeus? Your hubris will be your downfall!
declaringWar: The will of Olympus demands your submission. Prepare for battle!
defeated: Even the gods can fall. Remember our glory, for Greece shall rise again.
introduction: Greetings, stranger. I am Zeus, lord of thunder and king of the gods. What brings you to our lands?
name: Greeks
startIntroPart1: Hail, mighty Zeus, King of the Gods and ruler of Mount Olympus!
startIntroPart2: The Greek civilization calls upon the power of the Olympian gods. Lead your people to glory through divine favor and heroic deeds. May the gods smile upon your endeavors!
tradeRequest: The gods favor trade and prosperity. What say you to this offer?

attacked: You disturb the peace of the Pharaohs? You shall face the curse of the sands!
declaringWar: The wrath of Egypt shall descend upon you like the plagues of old!
defeated: Our pyramids shall stand long after we are gone. Egypt is eternal.
introduction: I am Ra, the Sun God, giver of life to all Egypt. What business have you in our sacred lands?
name: Egyptians
neutralHello: The sun shines upon us both.
startIntroPart1: Glory to Ra, the Sun God, bringer of light and life!
startIntroPart2: Egypt stands eternal, blessed by the gods of the Nile. Through the power of Ra, the wisdom of Thoth, and the strength of Set, build monuments that will last for eternity!
tradeRequest: Egypt offers the riches of the desert. Will you trade?

attacked: You seek to challenge the might of Asgard? Come then, to Valhalla!
declaringWar: Ragnarok comes early for you! Prepare to meet Odin's fury!
defeated: We shall feast in Valhalla. Our saga shall be sung for ages.
introduction: I am Odin Allfather, seeker of wisdom and lord of Asgard. Who dares approach the gates of Valhalla?
name: Norse
startIntroPart1: All hail the Allfather! Odin, wise and mighty, ruler of Asgard!
startIntroPart2: The Norse people are blessed by the Aesir gods. Through valor in battle and the favor of Odin, Thor, and Loki, carve your name into the halls of Valhalla!
tradeRequest: The Norse offer goods from the frozen north. Do we have an accord?

attacked: You challenge the masters of time? How... foolish.
declaringWar: Time has run out for you. Atlantis shall reclaim what was lost!
defeated: Even Atlantis could not stand against the tides forever. But we shall not be forgotten.
introduction: I am Kronos, Lord of Time. You stand before the remnants of the greatest civilization. State your purpose.
name: Atlanteans
startIntroPart1: Behold Kronos, the Titan of Time, lord of lost Atlantis!
startIntroPart2: The Atlanteans wield the power of the ancient Titans. Through advanced knowledge and the manipulation of time itself, reclaim the glory of the greatest civilization!
tradeRequest: Atlantis offers wonders beyond your comprehension. Will you trade?
